desc.en: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.jp: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.thai: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.ko: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.zh_tw: 躲過黑市保鑣追擊,順利逃脫的對策委員會一行人。他們看到額數驚人的現金，頓時陷入苦惱。但是很快就被星野說服，決定只帶著部分需要文件逃跑。而他們留下的一捆捆現金，則被亞瑠和便利屋職員撿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被阿露和便利屋职员捡走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被亚瑠和便利屋职员捡走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被亚瑠和便利屋职员捡走。

name.en: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.jp: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.thai: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.ko: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed

desc.en: When confirming the situation, everyone was surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wanted to use them to pay the debt, but was opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino said that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agreed to take away the documents only.
desc.jp: When confirming the situation, everyone was surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wanted to use them to pay the debt, but was opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino said that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agreed to take away the documents only.
desc.thai: When confirming the situation, everyone was surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wanted to use them to pay the debt, but was opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino said that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agreed to take away the documents only.
desc.ko: When confirming the situation, everyone was surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wanted to use them to pay the debt, but was opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino said that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agreed to take away the documents only.
desc.zh_tw: 確認情況時，眾人意外發現把近一億日元的鈔票也帶了出來。芹香與野乃美想要就此使用這些錢，卻遭到星野的嚴重反對，認為底線不可逾越。最終眾人決定只帶走檔案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野宫想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野乃美想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野乃美想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。

desc.en: Aru caught up suddenly and everyone returned to the "Masked Swimsuit Gang". Aru expressed the admiration towards them and said she wanted to be a villain just like them. Then the Problem Solver took away the money, and Aru was told the reality at the very end.
desc.jp: Aru caught up suddenly and everyone returned to the "Masked Swimsuit Gang". Aru expressed the admiration towards them and said she wanted to be a villain just like them. Then the Problem Solver took away the money, and Aru was told the reality at the very end.
desc.thai: Aru caught up suddenly and everyone returned to the "Masked Swimsuit Gang". Aru expressed the admiration towards them and said she wanted to be a villain just like them. Then the Problem Solver took away the money, and Aru was told the reality at the very end.
desc.ko: Aru caught up suddenly and everyone returned to the "Masked Swimsuit Gang". Aru expressed the admiration towards them and said she wanted to be a villain just like them. Then the Problem Solver took away the money, and Aru was told the reality at the very end.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠突然追了上來，眾人又回到了“蒙面泳裝團”狀態。亞瑠表達了對他們的仰慕，表示想要成為像他們那樣的壞蛋。之後便利屋拿走了阿拜多斯眾人搶出的一億日元，並最終還是被告知了情況。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露突然追了上来，众人又回到了“蒙面泳装团”状态。阿露表达了对他们的仰慕，表示想要成为像他们那样的坏蛋。之后便利屋拿走了阿拜多斯众人抢出的一亿日元，并最终还是被告知了情况。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠突然追了上来，众人又回到了“蒙面泳装团”状态。亚瑠表达了对他们的仰慕，表示想要成为像他们那样的坏蛋。之后便利屋拿走了阿拜多斯众人抢出的一亿日元，并最终还是被告知了情况。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠突然追了上来，众人又回到了“蒙面泳装团”状态。亚瑠表达了对他们的仰慕，表示想要成为像他们那样的坏蛋。之后便利屋拿走了阿拜多斯众人抢出的一亿日元，并最终还是被告知了情况。
